HiCExperiment 0.99.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

HiCExperiment methods

Source: R/HiCExperiment-methods.R
HiCExperiment-methods.Rd

HiCExperiment methods.

Arguments

x

A HiCExperiment object.

object

A HiCExperiment object.

name

...

value

...

i

a range or boolean vector.

Examples

library(HiCExperiment)
mcool_path <- HiContactsData::HiContactsData('yeast_wt', 'mcool')
#> snapshotDate(): 2022-12-16
#> see ?HiContactsData and browseVignettes('HiContactsData') for documentation
#> loading from cache
contacts_yeast <- import(mcool_path, resolution = 16000, format = 'cool')
resolutions(contacts_yeast)
#> [1]  1000  2000  4000  8000 16000
resolution(contacts_yeast)
#> [1] 16000
focus(contacts_yeast)
#> NULL
scores(contacts_yeast)
#> List of length 2
#> names(2): count balanced
tail(scores(contacts_yeast, 1))
#> [1] 4836 3565 1359 3534 3055 4308
tail(scores(contacts_yeast, 'balanced'))
#> [1] 0.9769857 1.2363711 0.3850165 2.1039880 1.4857936 1.7115655
scores(contacts_yeast, 'test') <- runif(length(contacts_yeast))
tail(scores(contacts_yeast, 'test'))
#> [1] 0.95060235 0.87176659 0.20451700 0.80209166 0.09637358 0.89386869
full_contacts_yeast <- full_contacts_yeast()
#> snapshotDate(): 2022-12-16
#> see ?HiContactsData and browseVignettes('HiContactsData') for documentation
#> loading from cache
topologicalFeatures(full_contacts_yeast)
#> List of length 5
#> names(5): compartments borders loops viewpoints centromeres
topologicalFeatures(full_contacts_yeast, 1)
#> GRanges object with 0 ranges and 0 metadata columns:
#>    seqnames    ranges strand
#>       <Rle> <IRanges>  <Rle>
#>   -------
#>   seqinfo: no sequences
topologicalFeatures(full_contacts_yeast, 'centromeres')
#> GRanges object with 16 ranges and 0 metadata columns:
#>        seqnames        ranges strand
#>           <Rle>     <IRanges>  <Rle>
#>    [1]        I 151583-151641      +
#>    [2]       II 238361-238419      +
#>    [3]      III 114322-114380      +
#>    [4]       IV 449879-449937      +
#>    [5]        V 152522-152580      +
#>    ...      ...           ...    ...
#>   [12]      XII 151366-151424      +
#>   [13]     XIII 268222-268280      +
#>   [14]      XIV 628588-628646      +
#>   [15]       XV 326897-326955      +
#>   [16]      XVI 556255-556313      +
#>   -------
#>   seqinfo: 17 sequences (1 circular) from R64-1-1 genome
data(centros_yeast)
topologicalFeatures(contacts_yeast, 'centromeres') <- centros_yeast
topologicalFeatures(contacts_yeast, 'centromeres')
#> GRanges object with 16 ranges and 0 metadata columns:
#>        seqnames        ranges strand
#>           <Rle>     <IRanges>  <Rle>
#>    [1]        I 151583-151641      +
#>    [2]       II 238361-238419      +
#>    [3]      III 114322-114380      +

#>   [12]      XII 151366-151424      +

#>   [16]      XVI 556255-556313      +
#>   -------
#>   seqinfo: 17 sequences (1 circular) from R64-1-1 genome
pairsFile(full_contacts_yeast)
#> NULL
